My nickname is Nahless, 28 yrs. old, and I'm from the Netherlands. 
I'm v=
ery interested in Japanese (samurai) history and culture; 
specifically the=
 Sengoku era. I'm hoping to find some people here 
who share my interests (=
looks like the right place!) since i've 
driven my girlfriend nuts with my =
'samurai talk'. To start off with 
a question: I've read Mitsuo Kure's 'Sam=
urai' (Tuttle books) and he 
writes on page 174 (near the top of the page) =
that Takeda Shingen's 
adult name (zokumy=F4) was Nobuharu. I was under the=
 impression that 
his zokumy=F4 was harunobu (as it is stated on samurai-ar=
chives).
Strange error of Mitsuo Kure or am I wrong?

Nahless
